code: public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     ExecCommand execCommand = getBinding().readInput(exchange, endpoint).     ExecCommandExecutor executor = endpoint.getCommandExecutor().     if (executor == null) {         // create a new non-shared executor         executor = new DefaultExecCommandExecutor().     }     log.info("Executing {}", execCommand).     ExecResult result = executor.execute(execCommand).     ObjectHelper.notNull(result, "The command executor must return a not-null result").     log.info("The command {} had exit value {}", execCommand, result.getExitValue()).     if (result.getExitValue() != 0) {         log.error("The command {} returned exit value {}", execCommand, result.getExitValue()).     }     getBinding().writeOutput(exchange, result). }
